summary: A ship sails into Brooklyn with all its crew dead. But something gets off and the killing continues on land. The vampire is looking for a specific woman - half-human, half-vampire. Rita's the cop detective investigating the many killings.
cast: Eddie Murphy|Angela Bassett|Allen Payne|Kadeem Hardison|John Witherspoon|Zakes Mokae|Joanna Cassidy|Simbi Kali|Messiri Freeman|Kelly Cinnante|Jsu Garcia|W. Earl Brown|Ayo Adeyemi|Troy Curvey Jr.|Vickilyn Reynolds|William Blount|Joe Costanza|John LaMotta|Marcelo Tubert|Nick DeMauro|Jerry Hall|Mark Haining|Wendy Robie|Alyse Kenny|Larry Paul Marshall|Vince Micelli|Oren Waters|Carlton Davis|Clive Ross|Michael Hyde|Maxine Waters Willard|Josef Powell|Roy Galloway|Carmen Carter|Julia Waters|Carmen Twillie|Ray Combs|Mark Anthony Cox|Andrew DePalma|Mitch Pileggi|Ken Tipton
keywords: vampire|yellow eyes|african american|brooklyn new york city|heart ripped out
title: Un vampiro suelto en Brooklyn
